# ai-skills

> 10 artifact-producing skills for AI agents. Generates files LLMs cannot produce from their token stream. MCP server or TypeScript library. Zero external dependencies.

## Connect (MCP)

```json
{ "command": "npx", "args": ["ai-skills"] }
```

10 tools: `generate_qr_code`, `build_pdf`, `build_spreadsheet`, `generate_ical`, `generate_chart`, `generate_vcard`, `generate_barcode`, `generate_wav`, `generate_hash`, `create_zip`.

## Import (library)

```typescript
import { skills } from "ai-skills";
```

## Skills

- `skills.generateQrCode({ data, size?, ecl?, fg?, bg? })` → SVG
- `skills.buildPdf({ title?, author?, date?, body, footer?, pageSize? })` → `{ base64, size, pages }`
- `skills.buildSpreadsheet({ headers, rows, summary?, format?, formulas?, bom? })` → CSV/TSV string
- `skills.generateIcal({ events, calendar_name?, method? })` → .ics string
- `skills.generateChart({ type, data, title?, width?, height?, colors? })` → SVG
- `skills.generateVCard({ name, org?, title?, email?, phone?, address?, url?, note? })` → .vcf string
- `skills.generateBarcode({ data, width?, height?, show_text? })` → SVG
- `skills.generateWav({ frequency, duration, sample_rate?, volume?, waveform? })` → `{ base64, size, duration, frequency }`
- `skills.generateHash({ data, algorithm?, encoding?, hmac_key? })` → `{ hash, algorithm, encoding, hmac }`
- `skills.createZip({ files: [{ name, content }] })` → `{ base64, size, entries }`

## Full API reference

- [llms-full.txt](https://github.com/edceds/ai-skills/blob/main/llms-full.txt)
